extendedInfo.description: The Flyers app makes it easy to find CFN cardlock fueling locations, as well as Flyers sites. Features include a locator that shows all CFN sites within a 25 mile radius of the user's current location, as well as a driving directions tool that displays CFN sites along the route.Please note: Due to an ever changing site database, this app is dependent on an active network connection and location services.

reviews.title: Eats battery life
reviews.comment: It works and finds all the local CFN stations.  But it drains your battery really fast.  It used 80% of my battery by itself in under 6 hours.  Be warned.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: When are you going to update this thing!? I am an over the road driver here in Wyoming now using this app to find a CFN in Larmie,Wy!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Poor
reviews.comment: Poorly designed app. Cannot copy and paste addresses. Doesn\'t tell you if it\'s unleaded or not. Use the book or website instead.
reviews.author: Keith Abbott

reviews.title: Terrible
reviews.comment: The maps are not accurate, it takes so long to load that you could have looked it up on the cfn site by the time is comes up, and it rarely finds my correct location (even though google can find exactly where I am). And I don\'t understand why, when they obviously use google maps to make their map, that it is not accurate (the symbol indicating where it should be on the map is often completely off from the listed address) and why can\'t I just click on the address and ask for directions?? Ridiculously bad app
reviews.author: Christina Mae Hough

reviews.comment: Map doesn\'t update. Even after killing and reopening. Lame.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Piece of junk. Doesn\'t open. Figures, from such a half-a**ed company as Flyers...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Crashes immediately. Never got it to run. Droid X.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Sucks b@$%z!
reviews.comment: Worst app ever! Dont waste your time with this POS. Youll end up stranded on the side of the road on an empty tank. The CFN book is your best bet for sure.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Portland Oregon
reviews.comment: Works great in the Portland Oregon area!! DROID 3
